ygData.subject: Re: Skill cap on Dual Wield?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, all. I saw a post on one of the message boards that said Sneak caps at 113, which is consistent with what Aaron is seeing. Don t know how reliable the
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, all.

I saw a post on one of the message boards that said Sneak caps at 113, which
is consistent with what Aaron is seeing. Don't know how reliable the source
is.

-----Original Message-----
From: Capps, Lee (EDS) <lcapps@...>
To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com' <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 26, 1999 10:41 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Skill cap on Dual Wield?


>From: "Capps, Lee (EDS)" <lcapps@...>
>
>actually it must be 255... cuz last i saw mine was 251.
>
>not that 5pts really matter @that stage in the game.)
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Adam Hayek [mailto:Adam@...]
>Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 9:05 PM
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Skill cap on Dual Wield?
>
>
>From: Adam Hayek <Adam@...>
>
>no, the cap is 250
>
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Aaron Braunstein [SMTP:aaron_spam@...]
>> Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 8:18 PM
>> To: Recipient List Suppressed
>> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Skill cap on Dual Wield?
>>
>> From: Aaron Braunstein <aaron_spam@...>
>>
>> Just hit 29 (*Shivers at the thought of being so close to
>> finally getting Flying Kick*) and all of my skills have capped, but
>> there as been no movement on Dual Wield since it hit 198 back during
>> level 28. Should I be worried? Is there a skill cap on this that
>> I've hit like I did with sneak back at 113? Anybody know for sure
>> whether or not they have gotten past this number?
>> --
>> Aaron Braunstein
>> Pacific Data Management, Inc.
>>
>> <aaron_braunstein@...>
